content: Create a serene environment that relaxes and delights with this levitating bonsai tree. This gravity defying miniature tree employs magnets to create the illusion that the small tree is magically floating in the middle of the air above its LED illuminated rock base.

Handle any task that comes your way by making sure you always carry a trusty Swiss Army pocket knife. This iconic staple of everyday carry gear is finely crafted using stainless steel with 17 different tools capable of performing 33 unique functions.

Keep your roommates from using your hygienic products by storing them inside this shower locker. It’s designed to be mounted directly onto the wall and comes with a waterproof 3-number combination lock that’ll ensure your belongings remain secure.

Upgrade any pair of shoes into smart shoes using these vibrating navigation insoles. Simply slip them into your favorite pair of kicks and the insoles will pair with your phone via Bluetooth to provide you with real-time directions while also tracking your daily fitness levels.

Send your taste buds to dessert heaven by sipping on some premium Godiva hot chocolate. It’s made using premium milk chocolate along with the highest quality all-natural ingredients to deliver a rich, smooth, and velvety drinking experience.

Stay properly hydrated while out on the water by hitching this floating drink cooler kayak to your watercraft. It features an insulated interior to keep drinks chilled, is large enough to accommodate thirty 12 oz cans, and features a watertight lid.

Keep your porcelain throne from reeking of death when you do your business by using this Unicorn Gold toilet spray. This non-toxic spray is designed to trap foul odors above and beneath the water, so your bathroom will always smell fresh.

Sharing your music with others is easier than ever when you encase your smartphone using this iPhone speaker case. The case comes with a 2900 mAh battery and a compact hi-fidelity speaker with 10 times the volume capabilities of standard iPhone speakers.

This unique night and day moving globe lets you accurately see when people around the world are experiencing sunrise and sunset. It’s outfitted with a special base that shows the time of day and date for any location on earth.

Turn any aquatic location into the ideal spot for an epic showdown using this floating beer pong set. The triangular tables float perfectly on the water or can be attached to a lightweight base so you can play over dry land – making them ideal for beach days and tailgates.

Adulthood Is Myth is a varied collection of hilarious and totally accurate short comics by Brooklyn-based artist Sarah Andersen that highlight the trials and tribulations of adulting in the everyday world. It is the ideal gift for anyone who’s not a motivated social snowflake.

Send your carnivorous taste buds on a flavor-filled journey by sinking your teeth into this exotic jerky & sausage gift box. The box comes with a drool-worthy selection of cured meats like bison, duck, elk, and wild boar that each pair perfectly with cheese and crackers.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Pussy Snorkel
content: Keep yourself from drowning in the pussy next time you find yourself plunging into a revitalizing muff-dive by wearing this glow in the dark pussy snorkel. With this handy contraption you’ll be able to perform uninterrupted cunnilingus with ease.

Turn your relaxing soak into an color-filled interstellar journey by dropping one of these LUSH bath bombs in your tub. From the moment you drop this vibrant bomb in the tub, it will release a flurry of color and a delightful peppermint aroma.

Make mornings your bitch by properly fueling up for the day ahead using the all-in-one breakfast cooking station. This wonder-appliance lets you prepare everything from your cup of Joe to your toast, sausage, and eggs simultaneously.

Maximize and enhance your everyday carry without adding bulk with the MSTRkey. This multi-tool is the same size as a common house key, fits on all the same key rings, and conveniently features 20 tools you might need in a pinch.

Improve the health of your skin by cutting out 99% of chlorine and chemicals using this water filtering shower head. Apart from filtering your bath water, it features five powerful spray settings and comes in an elegant chrome finish.

Bring class and style back to the art of writing by creating your works using this antique quill calligraphy pen. This Harry Potter themed set comes with one bottle of ink and an elegant quill – accented with an actual feather – that writes clean and smooth.

Keep track of who’s in the lead with scientific accuracy by outfitting your table with this automatic ping pong score keeper. Two table sensors and an additional net sensor work together to detect the ball’s nano-vibrations and determine the score in real time.

Keep your head from bobbing around while you try to catch some Z’s by cozying up with this wrap around neck travel pillow. The ergonomic wrap around design comfortably holds your neck upright while providing better support than traditional travel pillows.

Give your home bar an enchanting nighttime ambiance using this LED wine bottle lamp set. Each glass bottle comes stuffed with battery operated string lights that create a unique glow depending on the color of each glass bottle.

titleEN: Star Wars Heat Reactive Lightsaber Mug
content: Pay homage to the galaxy’s greatest warriors by marveling at their iconic weapons with this Star Wars heat reactive lightsaber mug. The stellar design showcases the lightsabers of beloved characters like Yoda, Darth Vader, Darth Maul, and Obi-Wan Kenobi.

Use your bedroom’s space more efficiently than ever by storing all your stuff inside this hidden storage compartment bed. The mattress lifts up to reveal a discreet yet ample space that you can use for storing anything from clothes to books, or spare linens.

Transform your dining room into a fun game room instantly using this 3-in-1 picnic pool and ping pong table. This seven foot table features a solid build that lets you alternate between a blue ping pong table, red pool table, or a lovely wooden dining table.

Indulge in a tasty sweet without putting on a single pound by basking in the sweet aroma of this churros scented candle. This all natural 8 ounce soy wax candle stands at 4 inches tall, measures 3 inches in diameter, and features an intoxicating cinnamon scent.

Lounge around in total comfort without looking like a bum by keeping it casual in these fake jeans pajama pants. These 100%cotton pants come with an elastic waste for added comfort and are printed with a realistic denim design.

Cooking your favorite artery clogging meat is as easy as making toast when you use this express bacon grill. It features a slim vertical design that fits easily on any counter top, it helps drain away grease, and it cooks up to 6 juicy strips in mere minutes.

Prevent winter-time damage to your roof and gutters using this roof de-icing cable. This easy to install cable requires absolutely no maintenance, provides 5 watts per foot, and is available in sizes ranging from 30 to 200 feet in length.

Add a little green and semi-erotic humor to any part of your home with this grow your own hairy beaver planter. This cute little woodland creature grows a thick and grassy bush on its back that can be shaped and styled any way you like.

Remain alert and nourished throughout the day by snacking on these coffee infused energy bars. They’re made from simple vegan-friendly ingredients, contain 1 cup’s worth of coffee per bar and come in flavors like coconut mocha, caramel macchiato, and mocha latte.

Adjust your living room’s natural lighting without having to get up off the couch by using these motorized curtain rods. They’re easy to install and come with a handy little remote that you can use to effortlessly control your blinds from anywhere in the room.

Increase your daily productivity by setting the tone using the “get shit done” notepad. Each of the 50 sheets come stamped with the succinct message while the notepad features a magnetic back so you can conveniently hang it up on the fridge.

Increase your kitchen’s usable counter space by using this multifunction sink cutting board. This 14″ x 10″ tray’s functional design includes an adjustable cutting board and an integrated basket/strainer that’s ideal for working with fruits and veggies.

Stop handling your pooch’s waste with your bare hands – now you can suck it up using this dog poop vacuum! This rechargeable vacuum is outfitted with a 30,000-rpm motor that will easily inhale your doggy’s stinky dookies from concrete, grass, and even snow.

Celebrate national high five day – yes that’s actually a thing – with an epic confetti blasting high five. This re-loadable hand device shoots out biodegradable confetti when you high five someone. It’s perfect for sporting events and weddings.

Hide your tools in plain sight while you’re at the job site by storing them inside this fuel can utility tool box. It’s designed with a lift out tool tray, removable drawers, screw driver storage slots, and a locking mechanism as an added safety measure.

Make bath time more exotic and relaxing than ever with this rainfall shower head. It employs an integrated system of four 22-nozzle adjustable spray heads that combine to simulate the effects of a gentle summer shower.

Spread knowledge wherever you go by teaching passersby the proper meaning of fuck. This novelty t-shirt is styled to look like a dictionary excerpt displaying the word “fuck” and its definition in bold black letters so everyone can see.

titleEN: Love Is Art Canvas And Paint Kit
content: Turn the art of love making into literal art by getting down with the “love is art” canvas and paint kit. Creating your erotic masterpiece is easy – simply cover you and your lover’s body in paint, climb on top of the blank canvas, and start getting freaky!

The epitome of style and function, survival belts will keep you looking dapper while providing you with useful tools for the wild. Each belt features a muti-tool buckle equipped with a bottle opener and fire starter while the strap can be utilized as a huge zip tie.

Treat your palate to the incomparable taste of the world’s finest meat by dining on this Japanese Wagyu Kobe beef. This A5 grade slab of beef is among the rarest and most sought after in the world for its incredible smooth texture and unrivaled flavor.

Bring a piece of your favorite fairy tale to life by having tea time using the Mrs. Potts & Chip teapot set. The high quality ceramic pot and mug come styled exactly like the lovable Beauty and the Beast characters – making them ideal for daily use or as collectibles.

Create a mountain of firewood easier and faster than ever before by using this firewood kindling splitter. It features an incredibly tough cast iron design that requires virtually no maintenance and allows you to easily split logs that are struck over the center wedge.

Give your party an edgy and exclusive VIP atmosphere by chilling your bottles in this LED champagne bucket. These sturdy buckets feature a unique shell with built-in LEDs which you can control with a remote to alternate between an array of vibrant colors.

Help your active toddler move throughout the house with record speed with these anti-slip baby knee protectors. Available in a range of colors, these unisex accessories feature a durable sole over the knees that helps keep the skin safe while providing extra traction.

Clear your sidewalk and driveway in record time this winter by placing this dual stage snow thrower on the job. Built with a 306cc engine that provides 14.5 foot-pounds of torque, this powerful device has a 19.5″ intake height and can easily clear a 29″ wide path.

Take your BBQ skills up a notch by grilling up mouth-watering dishes using these gourmet cedar cooking wraps. The wraps are extremely easy to place around your food and help enhance their flavor, moisture, and all around presentation.

titleEN: Star Wars Darth Vader Quotes Mosaic
content: Immortalize your favorite intergalactic villain in more ways than one by hanging this Star Wars Darth Vader quotes mosaic up in your home. This 9 x 12 inch piece displays a portrait of the sinister Lord Vader that is composed entirely of Darth Vader quotes.

Get the young, radiant, and slimy looking skin you’ve always yearned for by using these snail jelly masks. Each mask comes coated with real snail secretion, which has been known to have a variety of regenerative effects on the skin.

titleEN: Build Your Own Video Game Kit
content: Education and gaming combine when building video games with the Bloxels kit. This app-assisted kit uses a specialized gameboard and colored blocks to help design and create every aspect of the video game – from the levels to the main characters.

titleEN: Weighted Tri Spinner Top Fidget Toy
content: Keep your restless hands busy throughout the day by picking up one of these weighted tri spinner top fidget toys. Available in a range of colors, each one is fitted with bearings that allow you to easily rotate and spin  it on the palm of your hand or in between your fingers.

Get studio quality photos by creating visually stunning effects with this atmosphere aerosol can. With a few sprays you’ll be able to get a quality haze/fog effect without needing expensive and cumbersome fog/smoke machines.

Spice up your home’s decor by hanging up the visually stimulating Nature’s Dick Pics calendar. Each month  highlights a unique and exotic natural location where an impressive and robust rock formation naturally protrudes high into the sky – resembling an erect penis.

Increase your odds of escaping a possibly life-threatening situation by deterring your attacker with the Taser Pulse stun gun. It features a compact handgun style that you can conveniently holster, a long lasting lithium battery, and two live cartridges.

It’s a nostalgia overload as Woody and the gang join forces to bring you this Toy Story Voltron. Inspired by the classic 1980s cartoon, the iconic toys from Andy’s room are designed to fold, bend, and twist so you can transform them into the mighty Voltron.

Transform yourself into a mighty Super Saiyan by powering up your nap with this Dragon Ball Z sleeping mask. This 100% polyethylene bedtime accessory’s anime styled front depicts the eyes and hair of a powerful Super Saiyan.

Keep every single battery in your possession organized and always at hand with this handy battery organizer. It’s made from durable plastic and features a slew of specially designed slots made to perfectly fit every type of battery, from AAA to 9V.

Increase your visibility on the road during night time bike rides by using this reflective invisible spray. This light-reflective spray works on all kinds of fabrics, remains invisible during the day, and will easily wash off with water without damaging your clothes.

Enjoy your favorite Swiss treat without the hassle of melting an entire pots-worth of cheese by opting for these personal fondue mugs. You simply place your melted cheese or chocolate inside the mug while the candle underneath keeps it at the perfect temperature.

Caring for newborns is easier than ever with the Babies Owner’s Manual. It takes you through all the stages of baby ownership like “refueling” and “garaging” – displaying helpful facts,  flow charts, and even wiring diagrams to facilitate the learning process.

Easily place jewelry on yourself by using this bracelet clasp helper tool for the job. Its slim and long design extends all the way down to your wrist so that you can conveniently hold your bracelet in place while you use your other hand to close the clasp.

Give an entirely new meaning to the term “man-made” by filling your tummy with delicious and nutritious  meals made using the semen cook book. The book comes filled with dozens of mouth-watering recipes like “slightly saltier caviar” and  the “almost white Russian”.

Never misplace your headphones again! With the wristband headphones you’ll be able to keep them handy at all times. They come in a range of fashionable colors and conveniently wrap around your wrist, allowing them to be worn like bracelets.

Add some flair to your dining room by bringing the outside in using this faux grass table runner. This artificial turf runner sports a vibrant green hue that is great for providing a rustic touch to your home and is available in three different sizes.

This convertible bench to table’s versatile design lets you go from a sturdy table to a comfy bench in mere seconds. It features a tough  all-weather design that requires no maintenance and forms a full 6 person table when 2 halves are placed side by side.

Avoid having to place your designer bag on the dirty floor by carrying around this instant bag hanging clip. Simply open up the circular accessory and place one of the rubberized ends on the table’s edge to conveniently hang your bag right beside you.

titleEN: The Big Bang Theory LEGO Set
content: Recreate your favorite scenes from one of TV’s funniest sitcoms using The Big Bang Theory LEGO set. This geeky 484 piece set comes with everything you’ll need to build your own miniature version of Leonard and Sheldon’s iconic Pasadena apartment.

Drive your partner wild by appealing to their sweet tooth with this delectable candy G-String. These sensual undies are made entirely out of little heart shaped multi-colored  hard candies perfect for spicing things up in the bedroom.

Place a fun millennial twist on the way you relax out on the water by laying out on this giant poop emoji float. The iconic emoji jumps off your phone’s screen and into the real world to provide you with a comfy and eye-catching way to soak up the sun.

Ensure your towel is always nice and toasty by storing it inside this personal towel warmer. This device is compact enough to fit discreetly in any bathroom counter top and is large enough to heat two full size towels at once.

Now those suffering from conditions that limit hand movement can chow down in peace using the self-stabilizing spoon. It features built-in sensors that detect and counteract hand tremors, and can be adapted with a fork and knife attachment.

Reduce desk clutter without sacrificing productivity by outfitting your PC with this vertical second monitor laptop stand. It features a highly portable tri-fold design and maintains the monitor at eye level so you can work more comfortably and efficiently.

Keep your ammo handy at all times by placing this tactical butt stock cheek rest on your firearm. This right-handed non-slip cheek rest fits up to five cartridges along with a built-in utility pouch that’s ideal for storing your essentials.

Get your furry friend ready for the boardroom by placing him in this dapper professional pet neck tie. It fits comfortably over the neck and comes in a stylish yet conservative striped pattern that’s purrrfect for the corporate world.

Learn to wail like a rock god without taking professional lessons by using this guitar learning LED display system. This ingenious app-assisted device fits on your guitar’s fret and projects colored dots that will teach you proper finger placement for your favorite songs.

Jeff Goldblum themed bathroom decor – because sometimes you’re too preoccupied with whether or not you could, instead of stopping to think if you should. This curtain measures 60″ x 72″ and showcases the legend himself in a fabulous pink ensemble.

Never be caught without a charging cable again by carrying around this portable keychain charging cable. Available in one of nine vibrant colors, it features a magnetized design that folds around a metallic key ring, so you can easily attach it to your set of keys.

Learn a fun new skill by getting your hands on this palm wax candle making kit. The kit includes everything necessary to craft up to eight 100%  palm wax candles that you can infuse with scents like red pineapple, wildflower, and mango.

Monitor your body’s health every time you drop a chocolate dragon inside the porcelain goddess by consulting “What’s Your Poo Telling You?”. Inside you’ll find illustrated and witty descriptions of over two dozen types of poo with accurate medical explanations.

Minimize your chances of starting a raging inferno when you’re enjoying the great outdoors with help from this campfire extinguishing cover. It’s made from a  proprietary coated fiber glass material that has a combustion point of 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

Enjoy gazing at a full moon every night of the year by giving your bedroom some ambient lighting with this moon night light. The lamp emits a soft yellow glow and is made using innovative 3D printing technology to help create a more realistic appearance.

Give your four legged friend a stunning blinged-out grill by playing fetch with them using this grinning pet ball. Each ball is made from BPA-free food-grade rubber and features a savory peanut butter flavor your dog is sure to love.

Bring carnival styled fun to your backyard with this  DIY dunk tank kit. This cost effective alternative to a real dunk tank features a tough PVC frame that you can easily put together to provide hours of entertainment for family and friends.

Unless you’ve got a good roach guy, you can’t afford not to pass up this deal for a pair bonafide Madagascar hissing cockroaches! Guaranteed to arrive alive and crawling, each shipment includes your choice of male or female roaches.

Put your luck – and your liver – to the ultimate test by playing an intoxicating round of DRINKO. Each player drops a small coin down the track accented with dozens of small pegs that will guide the coin to one of the six shot glasses standing at the base.

Help stay warm when the temperature drops below freezing by putting on these indoor/outdoor heated slippers. These
ankle high boots come with four different heat settings and can last up to 10 hours on a single charge.

Keep your valuables safe while you’re out and about by storing them in the hidden compartment stash belt. It features an elegant all black design and comes outfitted with a long slender compartment, ideal for storing small items like cash and jewelry.

titleEN: Beauty And The Beast Enchanted Rose
content: Bring a classic fairy tale to life with this Beauty And The Beast enchanted rose. This incredibly detailed life size sculpture features fine gold glitter dusted onto the petals for a whimsical sparkle, while encased in a removable glass dome placed atop a walnut base.

Keep your tools from sliding away when you’re on the job by placing them on this flexible grippy tool mat. This anti-static mat is made from tough high quality polymers that won’t scratch delicate surfaces and is large enough to accommodate various tools at once.

Go from working in a seated position to a standing one instantly using this preassembled height adjustable desk. It comes fully assembled and features built-in handles that let you instantly adjust the height of the table so that you can work more comfortably.

Give your high-tech watch some old school flair using this retro Apple watch docking station. You simply side your Apple watch inside the designated slot to conveniently charge it while giving your watch a vintage Macintosh display.

Treat a range of foot related issues like Plantar Fasciitis and Achilles Tendinitis by hitting the foot gym. It comes with a range of resistance bands that you pull with your toes to strengthen your muscles and increase your stability.

Transform your tablet into a top-notch musical instrument using this iPad professional DJ controller. It comes with balanced XLR master outputs, touch-activated platters, and seamlessly integrates with your   existing music library.

Keep your tooshie nice and warm during long drives on cold days by outfitting your ride with this heated car seat cover. It comes with a small control that allows you to adjust the temperature, and features elastic bands so that you can securely attach it to your seat.

titleEN: Battle Of Helm’s Deep LEGO Set
content: Recreate one of the most epic scenes in the entire Lord of the Rings trilogy using the Battle of Helm’s Deep LEGO set. This  1,368 piece set comes with everything necessary to construct the iconic fortress and pit the forces of good and evil against each other.

Ensure you’re capable and ready to assume command of the U.S.S. Enterprise when destiny calls by studying up using this comprehensive owner’s manual. It provides in-depth information about every aspect of the iconic Starfleet ship.

Add a macabre touch to your home bar’s decor by storing your hooch inside this glass skull decanter. This sinister one liter decanter comes with a malevolent looking glass skull at the base that warns others to stay far far away.

Become king of the slope when you charge down wearing this lion ski mask. Designed for maximum performance and comfort, this mask features a 360 degree wrap around design to help you unleash your inner beast while remaining nice and toasty.

Light up your bedroom with a little prehistoric flair using these dinosaur table lamps. These cold cast ceramic dinosaur lamps feature a detailed and life-like design and come with a 7-watt bulb that creates a soft inner yellow glow.

Make keeping track of your ongoing adventures a fun geography game with this scratch off world map. Every time you visit a new exotic destination, you simply use a coin to scratch off the copper layer to reveal the vibrantly colored country underneath.
